Description: Publish clear privacy policy explaining data practices
Requirement: Must explain what data is collected how it's used and user rights
Implementation:
Create /privacy page with:
- Data collected
- How data is used
- Third-party sharing
- User rights (access, delete, export)
- Contact information
- Last updated date

Description: Define legal terms of using your service
Requirement: Clear terms that users must accept before using service
Implementation:
Create /terms page with:
- Service description
- User obligations
- Payment terms (if applicable)
- Limitation of liability
- Dispute resolution
- Governing law

Description: Obtain consent before setting non-essential cookies
Requirement: Must get opt-in consent before analytics/marketing cookies
Implementation:
Implement cookie banner with:
- Accept/Reject buttons (equal prominence)
- Cookie categories (necessary, analytics, marketing)
- Link to cookie policy
- Consent storage
- Easy withdrawal mechanism

Description: Enable users to exercise their data rights
Requirement: Must provide mechanisms for access deletion and export
Implementation:
Implement in settings:
- View my data (JSON export)
- Delete my account
- Download my data
- Opt-out of processing
- 30-day response SLA

Description: Have DPAs with all data processors
Requirement: Written agreement with each vendor that processes user data
Implementation:
Ensure DPAs signed with:
- Supabase
- Stripe
- Analytics providers
- Email providers
- AI providers

Description: Notify authorities and users of data breaches
Requirement: 72-hour notification to supervisory authority if breach affects users
Implementation:
Create incident response plan:
- Detection procedures
- Assessment criteria
- Notification templates
- Authority contact info
- User communication plan

Description: Verify age if service might be used by children
Requirement: If targeting users under 13 must get parental consent
Implementation:
If applicable implement:
- Age gate at signup
- Parental consent flow
- Data minimization for minors

Keywords: ccpa do not sell opt out
Description: Provide opt-out for sale of personal information
Requirement: Must have Do Not Sell link if selling/sharing data for advertising
Implementation:
If applicable add:
- Do Not Sell link in footer
- Opt-out mechanism
- Honor GPC (Global Privacy Control) signals

Description: Ensure lawful transfer of data outside EU/EEA
Requirement: Use Standard Contractual Clauses or adequacy decisions
Implementation:
For US services:
- Use providers with SCCs
- Document transfer mechanisms
- Consider data localization
- Privacy Shield invalid use SCCs

Requirement: Good practice to document accessibility efforts
Implementation:
Create /accessibility page with:
- Commitment statement
- Conformance level (WCAG 2.1 AA)
- Known limitations
- Contact for issues
- Third-party audit results
